messages.title: BURTON’S A&E SAVED!
messages.content: Andrew fought to keep it open, he petitioned with 50,000 people, he secured a staggering £8.1 million from the Chancellor to upgrade the A&E and now its saved.

messages.title: DELIVERING THE BEST BREXIT POSSIBLE
messages.content: Andrew wants Burton and Uttoxeter's businesses to get a hard-working treasurer that is why he voted to trigger article 50, he's delivering the Theresa May plan, helping the NHS to get a GOOD Conservative deal.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Andrew secured a staggering £8.1 million from the Chancellor to upgrade the A&E and now its saved.

mentions.tacticalSituation: YOUR CHOICE AT THIS ELECTION: STRONG, STABLE LEADERSHIP WITH THERESA MAY, or, A COALITION OF CHAOS WITH JEREMY CORBYN -- Think Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister in a new government. SO NOT SURE what is going to happen?

issues.brexitEurope: The best Brexit deal for Burton and Uttoxeter. Triggered Article 50. Voted to trigger article 50, he's delivering the Theresa May plan.
issues.economy: The risk is just too big to take: Higher DEBT, higher TAXES, ECONOMIC CHAOS
issues.governance: Standing with Theresa May for strong, stable leadership in the national interest.
issues.health: Burton’s A&E saved! Andrew got a staggering £8.1 million from the Chancellor to upgrade the A&E and now its saved.

politicalExperience.role: An MP who delivers for Burton and Uttoxeter
politicalExperience.achievements: Secured £8.1 million from the Chancellor to upgrade the A&E. Fighting to get funding and improvements for the A50, the M1 to Crewe. Attracting £169 million of government cash to out local area. Continuing to help businesses to grow, for individuals to find jobs and for children to get a fantastic local school place.

quotes.text: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest.
quotes.source: Rt. Hon Theresa May, Prime Minister

quotes.text: Andrew Griffiths, Burton and Uttoxeter standing with Theresa May.

images.caption: Andrew Griffiths with various individuals, including standing next to Theresa May.
Andrew Griffiths in a group showing a banner titled 'Save Burton A&E'.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet frames the election as a choice between Theresa May's Strong, Stable Leadership or a Coalition of Chaos with Jeremy Corbyn. Emphasizes the deliverance of the best Brexit and securing the future for healthcare.
